call_title: Ergo Dev Update Feb 9th 2025 |  SigmaUSD, Ledger, Minotaur, Nautilus, Rosen, ergfi, and more!

decisions.decision: Considering changing or coming up with alternative to ErgoHack like a spring or summer of code targeting a theme with much more time
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Discussion about improving developer engagement and preparation
decisions.quote: We spoke briefly about changing or at least coming up with some sort of alternative to an ErgoHack, like a spring or summer of code where essentially you target a theme and you get people on board, you give them much more time.

decisions.decision: Decided to proceed with Bitcoin Ruins integration implementation despite rate limit concerns
decisions.speaker: qx() (reporting for Rosen team)
decisions.context: Research phase completed for Bitcoin Ruins integration
decisions.quote: Despite encountering some concerns and regarding rate limits associated with certain APIs, we have decided to proceed with the implementation phase.

commitments.quote: C8 with ErgFi, Dexy Gold integration, ETA a few weeks.

commitments.commitment: Voting should be started soon in the testnet next 120 blocks epic epoch
commitments.quote: voting should be started soon in the testnet next 120 blocks epic epoch

commitments.commitment: Starting development phase for Bitcoin Ruins integration in near future
commitments.quote: we are looking forward to starting to develop that development phase in the near future
we'll see you on Thursday for a video AMA

open_questions.question: Why do we only have 176 blocks a day in the testnet with min difficulty?
open_questions.context: Kushti asking about testnet mining performance

key_facts.fact: Nautilus released version 0.2.0 of Ergo Ledger JS
key_facts.speaker: qx() (reporting for Anand Bihar)

key_facts.fact: 6.0.0 RC released with support for public testnet voting and activation
key_facts.speaker: qx() (reporting for kushti)

key_facts.fact: 30 or so interested wallets distributed for Cornell BRICK token out of 800 total students
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Mining testnet at like two megahash
key_facts.speaker: qx()
